code: import axios from'axios';var UserLoginSuccess=function UserLoginSuccess(data){return{type:'USER_LOGIN_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var UserLoginError=function UserLoginError(err){return{type:'USER_LOGIN_ERROR',payload:err};};var UserLogout=function UserLogout(){return{type:'USER_LOGOUT'};};export var UserLogin=function UserLogin(formData,cb){return function(dispatch){cb(true);return axios({method:'POST',url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"users/login"),data:formData}).then(function(res){dispatch(UserLoginSuccess(res.data));cb(false);}).catch(function(err){alert(err.response.data.message);dispatch(UserLoginError(err));cb(false);});};};var UserRegisterSuccess=function UserRegisterSuccess(data){return{type:'USER_REGISTER_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var UserRegisterError=function UserRegisterError(err){return{type:'USER_REGISTER_ERROR',payload:err};};export var UserRegister=function UserRegister(formData,cb){return function(dispatch){cb(true);return axios({method:'POST',url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"users/register"),data:formData}).then(function(res){alert('User Success Registered');dispatch(UserRegisterSuccess(res.data));cb(false);}).catch(function(err){alert(err.response.data.message);dispatch(UserRegisterError(err));cb(false);});};};
